src:
Mura je že prvakinja
Šimundža, Maroša in drugi Sobočani dvignili na noge. Prekmurje Do tal potolčena Olimpija se je verjetno še včeraj opotekala.
05 Nov 2019, 08:15 by Gorazd Nejedly
LJUBLJANA – Pet tisoč duš v Fazaneriji ni želelo zapustiti stadiona po zadnjem žvižgu slabega glavnega sodnika Damirja Skomine. S stoječimi ovacijami so nagrajevali črno-belo gručo nogometašev s trenerjem Antejem Šimundžo na čelu za veličastno predstavo, ki nikogar ni pustila ravnodušnega. Do tal potolčena Olimpija se je bržčas še včeraj spraševala, kaj za božjo voljo se ji je zgodilo v drugem polčasu.Sobočani so prvi polčas trpeli, a zdržali, v drugem pa z direkti neusmiljeno udarjali in prebijali ljubljanski obrambni gard. Po treh je bil že tako spuščen, da ne bi bilo prav nič presenetljivega, če bi povzročili še večje otekline. Trije goli v sanjskih drugih 45 minutah, taktično-tehnična izvedba par excellence, ognjemet, norija na tribunah so bili vrhunec čudežne nedelje, po kateri je v ospredju naslednje vprašanje: ali je Mura lahko tudi prvak?Glavni tvorec črno-bele nogometne renesanse Šimundža samo odmahuje z roko. Vijolična legenda se raje osredotoča na sedanjost in naslednjo tekmo. »Osvojili smo tri točke in nič več. So prestižne in motivacijske za še trše delo,« je v maniri skromnega delovodje povedal 48-letni Mariborčan, ki prihaja v najboljša trenerska leta. Po tem, kako vedri in oblači pri Muri, je nemara že na vrhuncu trenerske kariere. Oziroma jo po krajšem ustvarjalnem odmoru po odhodu z mariborske klopi, na kateri je premikal mejnike, podaljšuje.
Neprecenljivi domači fantje
Olimpija in Maribor imata resnega tekmeca, a še ne enakovrednega. Tudi Aluminij, ki je še vedno najprijetnejše odkritje sezone, kaže zobe, toda Mura je realno edina, ki lahko konča mariborsko-ljubljansko vladavino. Vrednost njenih delnic je še nižja od nekoliko nihajočih mariborskih, najbrž pa višje od špekulativnih ljubljanskih. Rutina zmagovanja je najmočnejše orožje Maribora, ki je hkrati tudi ujetnik lastnih uspehov. Njegovi ustvarjalnost in zagnanost sta na najnižji točki v tem desetletju, širok igralski kader, v katerem so najšibkejši člen tujci, pa je še vedno dovolj kakovosten, da ligaški maraton zaključi kot prvi. Olimpija živi z danes na jutri, težko je napovedati, kdo od igralcev bo spomladi še ostal. Njena dopadljiva igralna filozofija omogoča spektakularne tekme. A z napako, njena moč so (ne)plačani tujci, ki jo na fronti hitro ucvrejo, ko je treba krvaveti, kot bi morali v Fazaneriji.Prva Liga Telekom SlovenijeOlimpija       16       10       3       3       40:21       33Maribor       16       9       4       3       30:16       31Aluminij       16       9       4       3       26:13       31Mura       16       8       7       1       28:17       31Celje       16       7       6       3       32:16       27Tabor       16       5       2       9       20:25       17Domžale       16       4       4       8       22:32       16Triglav       16       4       2       10       21:39       14Bravo       16       3       4       8       19:33       13Rudar       16       0       6       10       15:41       6Največja soboška dodana vrednost so domači fantje. Brez neutrudljivega borca Maroše, ki zabija pomembne in čudežne gole, tehnično najbolj podkovanega Nina Kouterja, obrambnih stebrov Matica Maruške, Žige Kousa, hvaležnega in nič več le rezervista Klemna Pucka, poškodovanega kapetana Alena Kozarja, velikega upa Kaija Cipota tudi Šimundža ne bi imel tako čudežnih rok. In je zaradi svoje slovenskosti že prvakinja! Šimundževa odgovornost je še, da skrbno izbira prišleke v Sloveniji in iz tujine. Medžimurci, ki so le Prekmurci z druge strani Mure, ne sodijo mednje. Aluminij ne popuščaZadnja izida 16. kroga – Mura : Olimpija 3:1 (4400 gledalcev, Amadej Maroša 65., Miral Samardžić 70. ag., Matic Maruško 79.; Ante Vukušić 89. 11-m), Aluminij : Domžale 4:2 (400 gledalcev, Mihael Klepač 20., 71., Ante Živković 60., Matic Vrbanec 88.; Arnel Jakupović 43. 11-m, Slobodan Vuk 62.). Vrstni red strelcev: Ante Vukušić (Olimpija) 14, Predrag Sikimić (CB24 Tabor) 11.
text:
Mura is already a champion
Šimundža, Maroša and the other Sobočani rose to their feet. Prekmurje Olimpija, which had been shattered to the ground, probably had a break yesterday.
05 Nov 2019, 08:15 by Gorazd Nejedly
LJUBLJANA - Five thousand souls in Pheasantry did not want to leave the stadium after the last whistle of poor Chief Justice Damir Skomina. With standing ovations, they rewarded the black and white cluster of football players with coach Ante Šimundža at the helm for a magnificent performance that left no one indifferent. Oppressed Olympia hit the ground yesterday, wondering what happened to her in the second half yesterday. For the first time, the Sobocenians suffered but withstood, but in the second, they hit the Ljubljana Defense Guards relentlessly in the second. After three, he was already so low that it would not be surprising to cause even more swelling. Three goals in the dream for another 45 minutes, tactical and technical execution of par excellence, fireworks, madness in the stands were the culmination of a miraculous Sunday, which brought to the fore the question: can Mura also be a champion? he shakes his hand. The purple legend prefers to focus on the present and the next race. “We won three points and nothing more. They are prestigious and motivating for even harder work, "said the 48-year-old Maribor resident, who is coming to the best coaching years, in the manner of a modest manager. After being cheerful and dressing at Mura, she may already be at the height of her coaching career. In the aftermath of his creative break after leaving the Maribor bench, where he moved his milestones, he extends it.
Priceless home boys
Olympia and Maribor have serious rivals but not equivalent. Even aluminum, which is still the most pleasant discovery of the season, shows teeth, but Mura is realistically the only one who can end the Maribor-Ljubljana reign. The value of its shares is even lower than the slightly fluctuating Maribor shares, but probably higher than speculative Ljubljana shares. The routine of winning is the most powerful weapon of Maribor, and at the same time captures its own successes. His creativity and enthusiasm are at an all-time low in this decade, and the broad cast of the weakest strangers is still of sufficient quality to finish the league marathon as the first. Olympia lives from today to tomorrow, it is difficult to predict which of the players will remain in the spring. Her catchy gaming philosophy makes for spectacular matches. But with a mistake, her power is (un) paid aliens, who are fasting on the front when they need to bleed, as they should in Pheasantry. 31Aluminum 16 9 4 3 26:13 31Mura 16 8 7 1 28:17 31Celje 16 7 6 3 32:16 27Tabor 16 5 2 9 20:25 17Domžale 16 4 4 8 22:32 16Triglav 16 4 2 10 21:39 14Bravo 16 3 4 8 19:33 13Rudar 16 0 6 10 15:41 6Največja Soboški added value of the local men. Without the tireless Marosha fighter who scores important and miraculous goals, the technically savvy Nin Kouter, the defense pillars of Matus Maruška, Žiga Kous, the grateful and no more than reservist Klemen Puck, the injured captain Alen Kozar, the high hopes of Kai Cipot would not have even Simon of miraculous hands. And because of her Slovenianness she is a champion! It is also Šimundž's responsibility to carefully choose newcomers in Slovenia and abroad. The Medimurje, who are only Prekmurje on the other side of the Mura, are not among them.
